sentences.sContent: Grazing animals do it through the celluloses generated by the microorganisms of their rumen.
sentences.sContent_eng: Grazing animals do it through the celluloses generated by the microorganisms of their rumen.
sentences.sCn: 食草动物利用它们瘤胃中微生物所产生的纤维素酶来水解纤维素。

sentences.sContent: They will generally consume all but the hide, some of the large bones and skull and the rumen (stomach contents of ungulates) of their prey.
sentences.sContent_eng: They will generally consume all but the hide, some of the large bones and skull and the rumen (stomach contents of ungulates) of their prey.
sentences.sCn: 他们通常会吃光食物，但是也会把一些大的骨头，头盖骨，以及胃什么的藏起来。

sentences.sContent: The DCC method was used to study the rumen bacteria of water buffalo.
sentences.sContent_eng: The DCC method was used to study the rumen bacteria of water buffalo.
sentences.sCn: 本试验应用DCC法对水牛瘤胃细菌进行测定。

synos.tran: [脊椎]瘤胃（反刍动物的第一胃）

trans.tranCn: 瘤胃(反刍动物的第一胃)
trans.tranOther: the first compartment of the stomach of ruminants, behind the reticulum, in which food is partly digested before being regurgitated as cud
